text: Aur qom-e-fiaon kay sardaron ney kaha kay kiya aap musa (alh-e-salam) aur unn ki qom ko yun hi rehney den gay kay woh mulk mein fasaad kertay phiren aur woh aap ko aur aap kay maboodon ko tarak kiye rahen. Firaon ney kaha kay hum abhi inn logon kay beton ko qatal kerna shuroo ker den gay aur aurton ko zinda rehney den gay aur hum ko inn per her tarah ka zor hai
